thread.title: Berlinale film shows refugees' lives at historic airport

title: Berlinale film shows refugees' lives at historic airport
text:
Berlinale film shows refugees' lives at historic airport 8:28pm GMT - 02:02 
Brazilian director Karim Ainouz, shows the life of the airport's new residents in the documentary ''Central Airport THF.'' Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
